TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItemContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

span.span: Encapsulates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个简单的类，它封装 以提高效率。 is a simple class that encapsulates a for efficiency. 通过使用始终加载的单个类，您可以在需要时延迟加载 。By having a single class that is always loaded, you can defer the loading of the until it is needed. 由于可以从派生新类 ，因此您可以加载， 进而加载不在内存中的程序集。Because new classes can be derived from , you could load a that could, in turn, load an assembly that is not already in memory. 对于大型 对象集合，这可能会导致加载大量程序集，从而降低性能。For a large collection of objects, this could cause a large number of assemblies to be loaded, which decreases performance. 相反，工具箱服务仅处理 对象，并 仅在必要时才检索其包含的对象。Instead, the toolbox service deals only with objects and retrieves their contained only when necessary. 旨在保存中的所有缓存数据 。The is designed to hold any cached data from the . 默认实现仅保存的筛选器 ，但派生类可以选择缓存名称、图像和其他信息。The default implementation only holds the filter of the , but deriving classes may choose to cache the name, image, and other information. 对象支持两种形式的序列化：可以通过标准运行时序列化对它们进行序列化，也可以从中加载并保存自身 。 objects support two forms of serialization: they can be serialized through standard runtime serialization, and they can also load and save themselves from a . 前者提供将 对象保存到永久性存储的一种非常简单的方法。The former provides a very easy way to save objects to a persistent storage. 后者提供将 对象与混合数据存储格式相集成的方法。The latter provides a way to integrate objects with mixed data storage formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `data`参数可能包含类提供的数据 。The `data` parameter may contain data provided by the class. 它可能包含由用户提供的一个创建者读取的数据 。It may contain data that can be read by one of the creators that have been supplied by the user. 它也可能是具有分配了 creator 的剪贴板格式的数据 。It may also be data with a clipboard format that has a creator assigned to it. 在这种情况下， 将按需创建。In this case, the is created on demand.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是 对象的集合，这些对象表示 生成筛选器时应包括的任何自定义创建器。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the filter is generated. 自定义创建者可能会参与筛选器。Custom creators may contribute to the filters. `null`如果不需要创建者，则此参数可以为。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 存储在中的类型 可以有与之关联的筛选器。The types stored in a may have a filter associated with them. 筛选器可用于限制可放置在设计器上的工具。Filters can be used to restrict the tools that can be placed on designers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是 对象的集合，这些对象表示在 获取时应包括的任何自定义创建者 。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the is obtained. `null`如果不需要创建者，则此参数可以为。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 方法返回一个 ，该对象表示存储在中的数据 。The method returns a that represents the data stored in the . 绝不会返回 `null` ，也不会引发异常，但极端情况下除外 (例如，内存不足) 。 never returns `null`, nor does it ever raise an exception, except in extreme cases (for example, out of memory). 如果 无法制造，则会在特殊中嵌入相应的异常 。If a cannot be fabricated, the appropriate exception is embedded within a special . 当调用此特殊的方法时，将引发异常 。The exception is thrown when the method on this special is called. 这会将异常置于用户操作点。This puts the exception at the point of user action.
